alert.note: Alert for Juneau (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued June 15 at 4:27PM CDT until June 15 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Juneau County in central Wisconsin... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 427 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located over Hillsboro, or 15 miles southwest of Mauston, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * This dangerous storm will be near... Elroy and Wonewoc around 435 PM CDT. Mauston around 450 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this tornadic thunderstorm include Lindina, Union Center, Pleasant Ridge and Mullin Ridge. This includes Interstate 90/94 between mile markers 65 and 69. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
